---------------------------------------------------------------------



The Elements of King Crimson, limited edition Ã¢â‚¬Ëœtour boxÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ created to promote the bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 2014 tour of the same name, itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sold exclusively through the bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s merchandise booth on the tour and from the Discipline Global Mobile online stores.



The boxÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s content is less focused on actual songs and more on song Ã¢â‚¬Å“elementsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½; extracts of studio recordings, alternate takes, mixes with one or two instruments isolated, live recordings and rehearsals; the tour box is the first CD release for most of the tracks included, some of them have already been released for digital download through the DGM Live website, some them are set to be included in future DGM releases. The box marks the first time both studio and live recorded material with Gavin Harrison is released on CD, the first time material with Jakko Jakszyk is released under the King Crimson name, and the first time material with Bill Rieflin is released overall.
